graph_title: 일반적 범죄 두려움(밤에 혼자 동네 골목길)
indicator_name: 살고 있는 동네를 홀로 걸을 때 안전하다고 느끼는 인구 비율
target_name: 모든 지역에서 일어나는 모든 형태의 폭력과 관련 사망률을 상당 수준으로 감소

en.target_name: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Proportion of population that feel safe walking alone around the area they live
en.data_name: General fear of crime (walking alone in the neighborhood)
en.indicator_definition: This indicator measures the level of fear when walking alone in the neighborhood. Respondents were asked a five-point scale question: “Do I feel fear when walking alone in my neighborhood?”(Answers included: Never, Seldom, Neutral, Often, and Always)
en.global_indicator_name: Proportion of population that feel safe walking alone around the area they live
en.graph_title: General fear of crime (walking alone in the neighborhood)
en.source_organisation_1: Crime Survey and Statistics Research Division, Korean Institute of Criminology
en.title: Untitled
